setting.time: 1930s Moscow, evening several days later, hilltop overlooking city
setting.location: High hill outside Moscow with panoramic view of city
setting.weather: Clear evening with stars beginning to appear, gentle breeze

characters.appearance: Distinguished man, ageless appearance, dark hair, piercing eyes, now preparing to leave, timeless demeanor
characters.clothing: Black traveling cloak over formal attire, walking stick in hand, ageless dignity
characters.position: Standing at cliff edge overlooking Moscow, turned partly toward city
characters.action: Taking final look at city below, adjusting cloak for departure

characters.appearance: Large black cat, size of small person, now in natural animal form but maintaining supernatural intelligence
characters.clothing: No clothing, returned to normal cat appearance but retaining supernatural awareness
characters.position: Sitting beside his master, looking out over city
characters.action: Grooming paw while occasionally glancing at distant Moscow lights

characters.appearance: Other supernatural companions, various forms, ready for departure
characters.clothing: Dark traveling clothes, otherworldly appearance, carrying supernatural implements
characters.position: Gathered in small group behind main figure, prepared for journey
characters.action: Making final preparations for departure, checking equipment and consulting together

scene.mainElements: Hilltop overlooking Moscow with panoramic city view, rocky outcropping, scattered boulders
scene.details: Moscow spread out below with thousands of lights beginning to twinkle, church domes and government buildings visible in distance, rocky ground with sparse vegetation, evening stars appearing in darkening sky
scene.background: Vast Moscow cityscape extending to horizon, river winding through city, countryside visible beyond urban area
scene.atmosphere: Departure of supernatural forces after completing their mission, sense of cosmic balance restored, beautiful view emphasizing scope of events, peaceful conclusion to chaotic visitation, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Medium shot from behind group looking out over city
composition.focus: Main figure taking farewell look at Moscow before eternal departure
composition.depth: Foreground: rocky hilltop with supernatural group; middle ground: cliff edge and departing figures; background: vast Moscow cityscape under evening sky
